messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats: Run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield, Bristol and Cambridge. Won more votes than Labour in the last UK-wide local elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

images.caption: Martin Land engaging with a resident

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes a section for volunteering or showing support for Martin Land, including options for people to help the Lib Dems win, put up a poster, and join the Liberal Democrats.
